item.title: @elonmusk: We just took one more giant leap with@StarlinkThe fastest, most reliable Wi-Fi in the sky is now on ...
item.description: We just took one more giant leap with@StarlinkThe fastest, most reliable Wi-Fi in the sky is now on board 300+ planes, nearly our entire regional fleet. We expect to also have it on board more than half our full fleet (bringing the total to 800+ aircraft!) by the end of this year. More than 7 million of you ‚Äî on 129,000 flights ‚Äî have already been able to stream, scroll, game and connect from gate to gate with Starlink. FREE for MileagePlus members.

item.description: xAI in consultation with the Governor and local authorities deployed 500 generators to NES in Nashville to families in need. We are deploying an additional 500 generators to Mississippi Emergency Management as well.localmemphis.com/article/new‚Ä¶
